languages.text: "Его запытал тот же ксенос, что держал тебя в неволе и зверски убил твоих друзей. В некотором смысле вы товарищи по несчастью. Ты что, совсем-совсем ему не сочувствуешь?"
"He was tortured by the same xenos who held you captive and brutally murdered your friends. You are comrades in misfortune in a way. Don't you have any sympathy for him at all?"
languages.original_text: "Его запытал тот же ксенос, что держал тебя в неволе и зверски убил твоих друзей. В некотором смысле вы товарищи по несчастью. Ты что, совсем-совсем ему не сочувствуешь?"

traits.locale_text: "He was tortured by the same xenos who held you captive and brutally murdered your friends. You are comrades in misfortune in a way. Don't you have any sympathy for him at all?"
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.locale_text: "He was tortured by the same xenos who held you captive and brutally murdered your friends. You are comrades in misfortune in a way. Don't you have any sympathy for him at all?"
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.locale_text: "He was tortured by the same xenos who held you captive and brutally murdered your friends. You are comrades in misfortune in a way. Don't you have any sympathy for him at all?"

traits.locale_text: "He was tortured by the same xenos who held you captive and brutally murdered your friends. You are comrades in misfortune in a way. Don't you have any sympathy for him at all?"
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: 「あんたを捕え、あんたの友をむごたらしく殺したヤツと同じ異種族に拷問されたのかしら。ある意味、不幸仲間じゃない。同情のかけらもないのかしら？」
languages.original_text: "He was tortured by the same xenos who held you captive and brutally murdered your friends. You are comrades in misfortune in a way. Don't you have any sympathy for him at all?"

traits.locale_text: 「あんたを捕え、あんたの友をむごたらしく殺したヤツと同じ異種族に拷問されたのかしら。ある意味、不幸仲間じゃない。同情のかけらもないのかしら？」
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: “那些异形俘虏了他，残忍地折磨了他，就像对待你的朋友一样。某种程度上来说，你们也算是难兄难弟，难道你一点都不同情他吗？”
languages.original_text: "He was tortured by the same xenos who held you captive and brutally murdered your friends. You are comrades in misfortune in a way. Don't you have any sympathy for him at all?"

traits.locale_text: “那些异形俘虏了他，残忍地折磨了他，就像对待你的朋友一样。某种程度上来说，你们也算是难兄难弟，难道你一点都不同情他吗？”
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: « Il a été torturé par les mêmes xénos qui vous ont retenu prisonnier et ont sauvagement assassiné vos amis. D'une certaine manière, vous êtes des compagnons d'infortune. N'avez-vous donc aucune compassion pour lui ? »
languages.original_text: "He was tortured by the same xenos who held you captive and brutally murdered your friends. You are comrades in misfortune in a way. Don't you have any sympathy for him at all?"

traits.locale_text: « Il a été torturé par les mêmes xénos qui vous ont retenu prisonnier et ont sauvagement assassiné vos amis. D'une certaine manière, vous êtes des compagnons d'infortune. N'avez-vous donc aucune compassion pour lui ? »
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: «Le torturó el mismo xenos que le tuvo a usted prisionero y mató sin piedad a sus compañeros. En cierto modo ambos son camaradas de tragedia. ¿No siente ni un ápice de simpatía por él?».
languages.original_text: "He was tortured by the same xenos who held you captive and brutally murdered your friends. You are comrades in misfortune in a way. Don't you have any sympathy for him at all?"

traits.locale_text: «Le torturó el mismo xenos que le tuvo a usted prisionero y mató sin piedad a sus compañeros. En cierto modo ambos son camaradas de tragedia. ¿No siente ni un ápice de simpatía por él?».
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Er wurde von denselben Xenos gefoltert, die Euch gefangen gehalten und Eure Freunde brutal ermordet haben. Ihr seid sozusagen Kameraden im Unglück. Empfindet Ihr denn gar keine Sympathie für ihn?"
languages.original_text: "He was tortured by the same xenos who held you captive and brutally murdered your friends. You are comrades in misfortune in a way. Don't you have any sympathy for him at all?"

traits.locale_text: "Er wurde von denselben Xenos gefoltert, die Euch gefangen gehalten und Eure Freunde brutal ermordet haben. Ihr seid sozusagen Kameraden im Unglück. Empfindet Ihr denn gar keine Sympathie für ihn?"
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Seni tutsak edip arkadaşlarını zalimce öldüren zenolar tarafından eziyet görmüş. Bir açıdan seninle kader yoldaşı olmuş. Hâlinden anlamıyor musun?"
languages.original_text: "He was tortured by the same xenos who held you captive and brutally murdered your friends. You are comrades in misfortune in a way. Don't you have any sympathy for him at all?"

traits.locale_text: "Seni tutsak edip arkadaşlarını zalimce öldüren zenolar tarafından eziyet görmüş. Bir açıdan seninle kader yoldaşı olmuş. Ona hiç empati beslemiyor musun?"
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion
